feed.title: ZonePane Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Issue Templates: update bug report template by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1048
  • Bump pat-s/always-upload-cache from 1.1.4 to 3.0.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1160
  • Bump softprops/turnstyle from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1153
  • NodeInfo: Use Rest Controller structure by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1144
  • Update users => actors by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1164
  • Interaction: Use Rest Controller structure by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1149
  • Add release script by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1159
  • Add support for WPML post locale by @thomas-pike in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1166
  • Use _activityPubOptions at runtime by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1168
  • Migration: flush post caches by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1181
  • Release 4.7.2 by @mattwiebe in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1182

New Contributors

  • @thomas-pike made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1166

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.7.1...4.7.2

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 4.7.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix rewrite rules for NodeInfo by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1191
  • Release 4.7.3 by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1192

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.7.2...4.7.3

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Releases: Replace versions in upgrade scripts by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1179
  • Introduce Query Singleton, to store/query all ActivityPub related informations based on the $wp_query by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1148
  • Remove link to firefish by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1199
  • Actions: Only run tests once by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1207
  • Release Script: Replace @since versions by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1221
  • Check response body for tombstone type (#1209) by @mexon in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1222
  • Fix: Importing tags from the Fediverse by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1234
  • Scripts: Add generic wp-env command by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1238
  • Outbox Collection by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/593
  • Extra Fields: Fix rel me count by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1241
  • Changed: Moved password check to is_post_disabled function. by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1246
  • Rewrite: Flush rules by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1247
  • Release 5.0.0 by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1248

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/4.7.2...5.0.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Admin: Don't require publish_post cap to get activitypub cap by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1210
  • Fix negotiation of ActivityPub requests for custom post types by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1243
  • Allow the Base Transformer to use WP_Term objects as item of transforâ€¦ by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1260
  • Debugging: avoid PHP warning when actor is not set. by @jeherve in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1261
  • Clean up options on uninstall by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1134
  • Settings: Make tabs filterable by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1256
  • Rest API: Move Actors endpoint to use WP_REST_Controller by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1257
  • Outbox: Skip when importing by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1264
  • Fix/Change some return types in PHPDocs by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1242
  • Check if post is enabled before saving reactions by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1265
  • Version masking tests by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1271
  • Update Following endpoint to extend WP_REST_Controller by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1267
  • Change usage of fediverse symbol by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1239
  • Update Followers endpoint to extend WP_REST_Controller by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1266
  • Add: Show ActivityPub preview in row actions, when block editor enabled but is not used for post type. by @Menrath in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1273
  • ActivityPub Query: Improve third party plugin support by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1272
  • Fix NodeInfo rel by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1275
  • Release 5.1.0 by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1276

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/5.0.0...5.1.0

entry.title: New release for WordPress ActivityPub: 5.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix duplicate header by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1277
  • Outbox: Allow querying of outbox posts by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1281
  • Reply Block: add broader text by @kraftbj in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1283
  • Improve the wording of the Reply-Block by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1284
  • Outbox: Use actor type to determine actor id by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1280
  • Process Follower Inboxes in Batches by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1262
  • Update yoast/phpunit-polyfills requirement from ^3.0 to ^4.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1298
  • Enforce: 200 status header by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1299
  • Break up Collections endpoint and extend WP_REST_Controller by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1303
  • Outbox: Improve batch handling by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1286
  • Add rest controller for likes and shares by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1308
  • Nodeinfo: Add http docs by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1309
  • Fix CLI scheduler function by @jsit in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1316
  • Purge Outbox Items on Schedule by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1288
  • Magic method docs by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1307
  • Fix: set_object falsely overwrites the Activity-ID with a default by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1318
  • Add support for deprecated version replacements by @obenland in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1279
  • Fix: Do not add an audience to the Actor-Profile by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1319
  • Fix: Fix Comment CLI by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1320
  • Fix: duplicate content check by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1304
  • Release 5.2.0 by @pfefferle in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1321

New Contributors

  • @jsit made their first contribution in https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/pull/1316

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Automattic/wordpress-activitypub/compare/5.1.0...5.2.0
